other_title: ダンテス・インフェルノ (Japanese)
plot: Dante, who betrayed her wife Beatrice,now going to rescue her back from The Inferno. He travels to all of the nine centers of hell. But as he travels to the places, he learned about her family , about Beatrice's family. Lucifer is the main evil who is using Dante's to come back to the Paradise.
